tool_description: Get all the new games releasing in the current week. Updated each month
name: New Videogames Releases
title: New Videogames Releases

api_list.name: getMonthGames
api_list.description: Get the games releasing this month.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://new-videogames-releases.p.rapidapi.com/getMonthGames"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "new-videogames-releases.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getWeekGames
api_list.description: To get complete list of upcoming games of the week
